```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(spdep)
library(terra)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}

africa_admin <- read_rds("tb/africa_gadm.rds")
class(africa_admin)

africa_admin_sf <- st_as_sf(africa_admin)
```

```{r}
ggplot()+
    geom_sf(data = africa_admin_sf)

```

```{r}
load("tb/afripop2020.rda")
afripop2020 <- rast(afripop2020)
```

```{r}
class(afripop2020)
project(afripop2020,"EPSG:4326")
```

```{r}
afripop2020_df <- as.data.frame(afripop2020,xy = TRUE)
```
```{r}
afripop2020_df |> 
    ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y))+
    geom_raster()
```
